movies.Title: Wonder
movies.Writer: Stephen Chbosky (screenplay by), Steve Conrad (screenplay by), Jack Thorne (screenplay by), R.J. Palacio (based on the novel by)
movies.Actors: Jacob Tremblay, Owen Wilson, Izabela Vidovic, Julia Roberts
movies.Plot: Based on the New York Times bestseller, WONDER tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

movies.Title: I, Daniel Blake
movies.Actors: Dave Johns, Hayley Squires, Briana Shann, Dylan McKiernan
movies.Plot: After having suffered a heart-attack, a 59-year-old carpenter must fight the bureaucratic forces of the system in order to receive Employment and Support Allowance.
movies.Awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 24 wins & 30 nominations.

movies.Title: Tomorrow
movies.Actors: Anthony Barnosky, Olivier De Schutter, Cyril Dion, Emmanuel Druon
movies.Plot: Climate is changing. Instead of showing all the worst that can happen, this documentary focuses on the people suggesting solutions and their actions.

movies.Title: Get Out
movies.Actors: Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Catherine Keener, Bradley Whitford
movies.Plot: It's time for a young African American to meet with his white girlfriend's parents for a weekend in their secluded estate in the woods, but before long, the friendly and polite ambience will give way to a nightmare.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 48 wins & 98 nominations.
